tool_description: The Quip API provides read/write access to Quip.
name: Quip
title: Quip

api_list.name: addBlobToThread
api_list.description: Uploads an image or other blob to the given thread.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

api_list.name: addMembersToThread
api_list.description: Shares the given thread with the given user IDs and/or adds the given thread to the given folder IDs.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

required_parameters.name: memberIds
required_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs.

api_list.name: addMessage
api_list.description: Adds a chat message to the given thread, posted as the authenticated user.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: Plain text content of the new message (ignored if parts is supplied)

optional_parameters.name: frame
optional_parameters.description: One of bubble, card, or line

api_list.name: addPeopleToFolder
api_list.description: Shares the given folder with the given user IDs.

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The folder to which you want to add users.

required_parameters.name: memberIds
required_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs.

api_list.name: createDocument
api_list.description: Creates a document, returning the new thread in the format

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: The HTML or Markdown content of the new document

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the new document. If not specified, we infer the title from the first content of the document, e.g., the first heading.

optional_parameters.name: memberIds
optional_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs. The document will be placed in the specified folders, and any individual users listed will be granted individual access to the document. If this argument is not given, the document is created in the authenticated user's Private folder.

api_list.name: createFolder
api_list.description: Creates a folder.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: One of the color constants above. Example: manila

optional_parameters.name: parentId
optional_parameters.description: If given, we make the folder a child of the given folder. If not given, we create the folder on the authenticated user's Private folder.

optional_parameters.name: memberIds
optional_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs.

api_list.name: createSpreadsheet
api_list.description: Creates a spreadsheet, returning the new thread in the format

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.description: The HTML or Markdown content of the new document

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the new document. If not specified, we infer the title from the first content of the document, e.g., the first heading.

optional_parameters.name: memberIds
optional_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs. The document will be placed in the specified folders, and any individual users listed will be granted individual access to the document. If this argument is not given, the document is created in the authenticated user's Private folder.

api_list.name: getAuthenticatedUser
api_list.description: Returns the currently authenticated user.

api_list.name: getContacts
api_list.description: Returns a list of the contacts for the authenticated user.

api_list.name: getFolders
api_list.description: Return data for each of the given folders in a dictionary by folder ID.

api_list.name: getRecentMessages
api_list.description: Returns a list of the most recent messages for the given thread, ordered reverse-chronologically.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of messages to return.

optional_parameters.name: maxCreatedUsec
optional_parameters.description: If given, we return messages updated before the given max_created_usec, which is a UNIX timestamp in microseconds.

api_list.name: getRecentThread
api_list.description: Returns the most recent threads to have received messages, similar to the inbox view in the Quip app.

api_list.name: getSingleFolder
api_list.description: Returns the given folders.

api_list.name: getSingleThread
api_list.description: Returns the given thread.

api_list.name: getSingleUser
api_list.description: Returns the given users.

api_list.name: getThreadBlob
api_list.description: Retrieves the binary representation of the given blob from the given thread if the user has access.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

api_list.name: getThreads
api_list.description: Returns the given threads.

api_list.name: getUsers
api_list.description: Return data for each of the given users in a dictionary.

api_list.name: removeMembersFromThread
api_list.description: Removes the given individuals from the given thread and/or removes the thread from the given folders.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

required_parameters.name: memberIds
required_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs.

api_list.name: removePeopleFromFolder
api_list.description: Shares the given folder with the given user IDs.

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The folder to which you want to add users.

required_parameters.name: memberIds
required_parameters.description: List of folder IDs or user IDs.

api_list.name: updateDocument
api_list.description: Incrementally modifies the content of a document.

required_parameters.name: threadId
required_parameters.description: The thread whose document you want to modify

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Where we should insert the new content. Must be: 0,1,2,3,4,5

optional_parameters.name: content
optional_parameters.description: The HTML or Markdown content of the new document

optional_parameters.name: sectionId
optional_parameters.description: The id for the section you want to modify. Needed for some location values.

api_list.name: updateFolder
api_list.description: Updates a folder.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: One of the color constants above. Example: manila
